page.title: 04RELIGION
page.content: {Rosedale Church}is dedicated to St.Mary and St.Lawrence. It stands on the site of a small Cistercian Nunnery which was founded before 1150 and disbanded by Henry VIII in 1535. {The Vicar}is also the Vicar for the Parishes of Hutton-le-Hole,Cropton, Appleton le Moor and Lastingham where he resides. A{'Sunday' School}is held at 3.30.pm on a Monday usually in the school.This is taken by the Vicar.He also may take a Service in the small{Primitive {Methodist Chapel}at Hartoft. There are two Chapels that are no longer in use as Chapels. One has been converted into a Private Dwelling and the other into two units with workshops and living accomadation. As yet,the latter are not completed. During the holiday Season{Catholic Services are held in the Church.
